item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

so if i add all the gfx modles into 1 gfx it should work right? just like you do with a npc that has more than one modle?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 05:36:09 PM[/size][hr]close topic i got real darkbow spec gfx working

item.title: Changing how a added gfx moves and works
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

The gfx is 380…It’s not in the first spec code, but in the second and 3rd, control f 15156(Darkbow Code) til you see the special thing and look for 380, it wont say gfx 380.
